de.zabuza.soundEngine

Class WorkingSoundEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.soundEngine.SoundEngine
      • de.zabuza.soundEngine.WorkingSoundEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class WorkingSoundEngine
extends SoundEngine
    WorkingSoundEngine. Provides playing .wav mono sounds and .midi or .mid. Will create a own stereo interpretation of sounds with the x- and y-coords of the SoundSource.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Constructor Summary

      WorkingSoundEngine(int maxChannels)
      Creates a new WorkingSoundEngine with given maximal channels for sounds.

      • WorkingSoundEngine

        public WorkingSoundEngine(int maxChannels)
                   throws javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException
        Creates a new WorkingSoundEngine with given maximal channels for sounds.
        Parameters:
        maxChannels - Maximal amount of channels for sounds
        Throws:
        javax.sound.sampled.LineUnavailableException - If line can not be opened. This situation arises most commonly when a requested line is already in use by another application.
